description: Detects potential PowerShell execution from a DLL instead of the usual PowerShell process as seen used in PowerShdll
author: Markus Neis
Nasreddine Bencherchali
name: Potential PowerShell Execution Via DLL
query: (((process.executable.text:(*\\rundll32.exe OR *\\regsvcs.exe OR *\\InstallUtil.exe OR *\\regasm.exe)) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("RUNDLL32.EXE" OR "RegSvcs.exe" OR "InstallUtil.exe" OR "RegAsm.exe"))) AND process.command_line.text:(*Default.GetString* OR *FromBase64String* OR *Invoke\-Expression* OR *IEX\ * OR *Invoke\-Command* OR *ICM\ * OR *DownloadString*))
